root.message: The REC_USE_LIM field for indicator 8-10-2, translated into en
root.data: World Bank’s Global Findex database is based on individual level surveys worldwide, conducted every three years. The first round of the survey was done in 2011, and the second in 2014 and the third in 2017. The fourth and most recent round was done in 2021. The database covers about 123 countries.
